alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 12:34PM PST until February 22 at 1:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts to 60 mph expected below 5000 feet, and up to 80 mph above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes, Owens Valley and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Widespread blowing dust will be possible, leading to reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Extremely hazardous travel conditions are expected along Highway 395 due to a very high risk of blowovers.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other lightweight fixtures and unsecured outdoor objects. Operators of motorcycles, vans, campers, trailers, and other high profile vehicles should be especially cautious for the possibility of sudden, strong crosswinds and be prepared for areas of blowing dust which could drastically reduce visibility.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County
